lead_paragraph: South Korea’s exports increased in December at the fastest rate in 17 months, adding to signs that the country’s economy is recovering from the global recession.
snippet: South Korea’s exports increased in December at the fastest rate in 17 months, adding to signs that the country’s economy is recovering from the global recession.

headline.main: South Korea’s Exports Surged Last Month
headline.print_headline: South Korea’s Exports Surged Last Month
